briefTitle: Mobile Application Support for Women With Breast Cancer Undergoing Chemotherapy
officialTitle: The Effectiveness of a Mobile Application as a Support Tool for the Treatment of Women With Breast Cancer Undergoing Chemotherapy: A Randomized Controlled Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change from the baseline score of the Symptom-Management Self-Efficacy Scale-Breast Cancer, SMSES-BC at the third chemotherapy (T1) and the sixth chemotherapy (T2).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* at least 20 years of age.
* diagnosed with breast cancer for the first time.
* treated with chemotherapy at the study sites.
* able to access the internet with a mobile phone.
* Fluent in spoken and written Chinese .

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients with cognitive dysfunction.
* diagnosed mental health problems.
* having with other cancers.
